name: search_place_id_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool complete_study_bible.
Tool description: The most COMPLETE Bible study API available! Strongs, Locations, Dictionaries, and more! 
API description: Used in conjuction with Chapter and Verse API, Place Detail API. Receives a Place Unique ID, returns a list of all verses in the Bible that mention the place. Helpful for studying the Biblical history of a particular place.

place_unique_id.description: The unique identifier for the place to be searched in the API.
